title: Luxury 4 Bed - Harvard Business School - Trader Joes - Boston Landing
map_address: Franklin St near N Harvard St
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 299623662', 'Rent: $5,000 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 07/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Simply stunning, BRAND NEW construction in Lower Allston - walking distance to Harvard Business School, Boston Landing and more!', '4 Beds 2 Baths, high end finishes throughout, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors and Central Air -  WASHER and DRYER IN UNIT - Private outdoor patio - 2 OFF STREET PARKING SPACES INCLUDED - Available NOW -  Dont miss your opportunity to be the first tenants in this amazing home!', 'Contact Chris for showings this week!', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @ <URL>          860 - 309 - 8511', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Lincoln St (0.32 mi)', 'Rail: Framingham/Worcester Line Boston Landing (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: 66 N Harvard St @ Franklin St (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Western Ave @', 'Riverdale St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 70 Western Ave @ N Harvard St (0.23 mi)', '299623661', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
